text: Albert of Saxe-Wittenberg (; died 28 June 1385 in Wittenberg) was born as the son of Otto (d. 30 March 1350), a younger son of the prince-elector Rudolf I of Saxe-Wittenberg, and his (Otto's) wife Elisabeth, daughter of Duke William II of Brunswick-L端neburg. In 1370 he succeeded his (maternal) grandfather as the Duke or Prince of L端neburg. Category:1340s births Category:1385 deaths Category:German dukes and duchesses Category:Princes of L端neburg
title: Albert of Saxe-Wittenberg, Duke of L端neburg
